title: Video: Young Rival – Two Reasons
body: When Canadian trio **Young Rival** discovered make-up artist [James Kuhn](http://www.flickr.com/photos/hawhawjames) back in February 2011, I’m sure they never would have dreamed that he would later craft one of the finest music videos of 2012, set to their music. Scuzzy rock and roll with a smoked-out Wavves sort of vibe going on, _Two Reasons_ is far and away the weirdest music video you’ll see this year. Check it out below.
